meanings.definition: A device on a bicycle or motorcycle that supports it in an upright position when not in use.
meanings.sent1: The kickstands on my bike make it easy to park.
meanings.sent2: I always remember to use the kickstands when I park my motorcycle.
meanings.sent3: When the kickstands on the bike broke, it kept falling over comically.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was his kickstands, keeping him steady in tough times.
meanings.sent5: The shiny kickstands gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To use a kickstand to prop up a bicycle or motorcycle.
meanings.sent1: She kickstands her bike outside the cafe before going in.
